author: void.xyz
content: I have a newbie question about collisions in verkle trees. I'm currently reading Vitalik's article on verkle trees (https://vitalik.ca/general/2021/06/18/verkle.html) and wanted to know what happens if you insert `baaaa` when the key `baaa` exists as a leaf node. Would the leaf node at key `baaa` become an inner node with the prefix `ba` and have it point to another set of children?

author: void.xyz
content: (not sure if this is the right channel to ask this but this channel was the closest thing related to verkle trees)

author: void.xyz
content: Also I see that the proposed width for verkle trees is 256 (maybe even 1024), does this imply base-256 keys?

author: bridge-bot
content: <dankrad> yes (re @verkle_bot: <charles>I have a newbie question about verkle trees about collisions. I'm currently reading Vitalik's article on verkle trees (https://vitalik.ca/general/2021/06/18/verkle.html) and wanted to know what happens if you insert `baaaa` when the key `baaa` exists as a leaf node. Would the leaf node at key `baaa` become an inner node with the prefix `ba` and have it point to another set of children?)
